price: Hüsranın ardından da Cehennem vardır. Orada kendisine irinli su içirilecektir.
arabic: مِّن وَرَآئِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ وَيُسۡقَىٰ مِن مَّآءٖ صَدِيدٖ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: min warāihi jahannamu wayus'qā min māin ṣadīdin
translations: and he will be made to drink
